properties.description:
**THIS TASK IS FOR MORE EXPERIENCED MAPPERS**
------------------

- Author: **Kathmandu Living Labs / HOT volunteers**
- Requesting organization: **Nepal Government, International Response community**
- Priority: **Urgent**
- Imagery: **DigitalGlobe, 2015-04-29**

The objective is to help with aid delivery and search & rescue efforts by identifying earthquake damaged buildings and displaced populations.

Objects to trace
=====

* Report severely damaged housing areas - **landuse=brownfield**
* IDP informal camps

Please review the [Nepal Earthquake - IDP Collection Guidance](http://hotosm.github.io/tracing-guides/guide/Nepal.html#IDP Collection Guidance).
properties.author: Nirab Pudasaini
properties.short_description:
**THIS TASK IS FOR MORE EXPERIENCED MAPPERS**
=======

- Author: **Kathmandu Living Labs / HOT volunteers**
- Requesting organization: **Nepal Government, International Response community**
- Priority: **Urgent**
- Imagery: **DigitalGlobe, 2014-04-29**

The objective is to help with aid delivery and search & rescue efforts by identifying earthquake damaged buildings and displaced populations.

Objects to trace
=====
* Report severely damaged housing areas - `landuse=brownfield`
* IDP informal camps
properties.instructions:
**THIS TASK IS FOR MORE EXPERIENCED MAPPERS**
------------------

** Imagery 
source=Digital Globe, 2014-04-29

    ID editor
    tms:http://mw1.gstatic.com/crisisresponse/firstlook/2015/firstlook_PO_054334261010_01_2015_04_29_maptiles/{x}_{y}_{z}.png 

    JOSM editor  Modify / Parameters  / WMS - TMS, + TMS
    tms:http://mw1.gstatic.com/crisisresponse/firstlook/2015/firstlook_PO_054334261010_01_2015_04_29_maptiles/{x}_{y}_{zoom}.png 
 
From the DigitalGlobe image. locate the villages and informal campsites.

** Report severely damaged housing areas - landuse=brownfield**
==========================
Trace a polygon around the block of houses and add the following tags

* **landuse=brownfield**
* **damage:event=nepal_earthquake_2015**
* **source=DigitalGlobe, 2015-04-29**


** IDP informal camps**
==========================
Trace a polygon around the tents where people are gathered and add the following tags

* **idp:camp_site=spontaneous_camp**
* **damage:event=nepal_earthquake_2015**
* **source=DigitalGlobe, 2015-04-29**

PLEASE reference the 
[Nepal Earthquake - IDP Collection Guidance](http://hotosm.github.io/tracing-guides/guide/Nepal.html#IDP Collection Guidance)
properties.name: Nepal Earthquake, 2015, Severely damaged housing areas and IDP Informal camps, Gorkha
